ygData.subject: Prexus Server
ygData.msgSnippet: As you guys might have known, the new server Prexus is up already. Being a wizard, I have always wanted to play the dark side and have always been fascinated
ygData.messageBody:
As you guys might have known, the new server Prexus is up already. Being a wizard, I have always wanted to play the dark side and have always been fascinated by the necromancer's array of spells. Therefore i have decided to make a Gnomish Necromancer in the Prexus server and see how it goes. Being a new server, less people would probably be there, and thus the initial xp gain should be speedy enough. Anyone who is willing to switch servers for a while to try out the class they always wanted, but not able to bear to leave their main characters can always join me. )
My nick there would probably be Gandalf but if server does not allow it, then Khadgar or Leshrac. Laters!

Leshrec
